verses.name: Leviticus 23:25
verses.text: Ye shall do no servile work therein: but ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:26
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 23:27
verses.text: Also on the tenth day of this seventh month there shall be a day of atonement: it shall be an holy convocation unto you; and ye shall afflict your souls, and offer an offering made by fire unto the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:28
verses.text: And ye shall do no work in that same day: for it is a day of atonement, to make an atonement for you before the Lord your God.
